name: Alminav
short_description:
Route planning and offline navigation for cyclists and hikers. You can pre-download maps and routing data for offline use. This saves you from expensive data costs (especially while roaming) and slow download times.

Features
Map view using vector maps (MapsForge format)
Offline route calculation
Display maps with contourlines
Streetmaps for Germany, France, Italy, Austria, Sitzerland, Spain, Denmark, Belgium, Netherlands
GPS tracking, save track as kml file
Import KML routes
Export routes as kml file
Elevation chart
Velocity chart
Street search
Replay route

The topographic maps cover the areas of
Germany 
Denmark
Benelux
Austria 
Switzerland 
The Alps
Italy including Rome, Sardinia, Sicily and Ischia
Eastern parts of France including Paris
The Mediterranean coast of Tunisia
The Mediterranean coast of Turkey
Mallorca
Corsica
Corfu
Canarias
Cyprus
Crete
Madeira

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.almica.alminav
summary: Route planning and offline navigation for cyclists and hikers
